Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Changes the due date by which the New York State teachers' retirement system is required to submit the annual MWBE report
Summary: Changes the due date by which the New York State teachers' retirement system is required to submit the annual MWBE report to on or before December thirty-first following the end of the teachers retirement system's fiscal year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to changing the due date by which the New York State teachers' retirement system is required to submit the annual MWBE report
